resources: The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean The source of the Nile River is in Egypt The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake About 95 percent of the Chinese people live on a plateau in Tibet //false The Indian subcontinent is surrounded by the Pacific Ocean //false Japan has a strong economy due to skilled workforce, government aid, and foreign investments //true A Jati is a small group within a larger caste //true The Ganges river is one of India\'s most important rivers //true The Greenwich Meridian runs through London and is 0 degrees longitude //true The International DateLine separates lines of latitude between the east and the west //false The Grand Banks are one of the richest fishing grounds in the world //true The cultural groups of West Africa are cultivators and the pastoralists //false Because of the improvements in medical care, the death rate is increasing in West Africa //false Hebrew is spoken by most people in North Africa and the Middle East //false
